---
title: "Qubit - High Sensitivity"
output: html_notebook
params:
  num_samples: 1
---

# Enter the number of samples to be quantified above
```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Supplies Needed
```{r}
qubit <- tribble(~item, ~quantity, 
                 "qubit_tubes", params$num_samples + 2,
                 "qubit_dye_ul", params$num_samples + 2,
                 "qubit_buffer_ul", 199 * (params$num_samples + 2),
                 "qubit_std1_ul", 10,
                 "qubit_std2_ul", 10)

```
